name: Achipato
description:
IMPORTANT: This is my old game. My new game is called 'Achikaps'.

Achipato - a real time strategy game made ​​in a minimalist style. Build bases and train units. Gameplay is adapted to the mobile platform.
Features:
+ Simple rules
+ Easy controls
+ Smooth animation
+ 80 levels

The game is absolutely free and does not contain any advertising or donation.
